name: Plus 2PM
author: Michal Bartak <maxym.srpl@gmail.com>
measure_description: The measured device fw: 1.7.1. The result represents the average value of measurements collected from the measuring device API for the following scenarios: dumb device/baseline consumption (~3.8W) and several device configurations. See sub-profiles.
config_flow_sub_profile_remarks: Select a profile depending on your Shelly device configuration.
